data.text: Mɛto dwom ama me dɔfo
Ɔfuntum asase no yiyii mu aboɔ,
“Afei, mo a motete Yerusalem ne Yuda mmarima,
Ɛdeɛn bio na anka ɛsɛ sɛ meyɛ ma me bobe turo
Afei, mɛka
Mɛma ayɛ asase a ɛda mpan
Asafo Awurade bobe turo no
Nnome nka mo a mode efie ka efie ho
Asafo Awurade apae mu aka ama mate:
Bobefuo kɛseɛ pa ara no
Wɔnnue, wɔn a wɔsɔre anɔpahema
Wɔbɔ sankuten ne bɛnta wɔ wɔn apontoɔ ase,
Ɛno enti, me nkurɔfoɔ bɛkɔ nnommumfa mu,
Enti, damena akɔnnɔ yɛ kɛseɛ
Enti, wɔbɛbrɛ onipa ase
nanso Asafo Awurade atɛntenenee bɛpagya no,
Afei nnwan bɛkɔ adidi te sɛ deɛ wɔwɔ wɔn adidibea;
Monnue, mo a mode nnaadaa nhoma twetwe bɔne,
Monnue, mo a moka sɛ, “Onyankopɔn nyɛ ntɛm,
Monnue, mo a mofrɛ bɔne sɛ papa
Monnue, mo a mobu mo ho anyansafoɔ, mo ankasa ani so
Monnue mo a wɔfrɛ mo akatakyie wɔ nsanom mu
Mo a mogye adanmudeɛ, na mo gyae deɛ ɔdi fɔ
Enti, sɛdeɛ egyadɛreɛ hye wira dwaneeɛ
Enti Awurade abufuo aba ne nkurɔfoɔ so,
Ɔpagya frankaa ma akyirikyiri aman,
Wɔn mu biara mmrɛ na ɔnsunti,
Wɔn agyan ano yɛ nnam,
Wɔn mmobɔmu te sɛ gyata deɛ,
Ɛda no wɔbɛbobɔ mu agu ne so
